rows.label: qev025502_MSG0001
rows.name:
He's so slow. Slow, slow, slow! What is that fool
brother of mine Sostenasa even doing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0002
rows.name:
The humans are risking their lives fighting for us,
you know? And he's dragging his heels! This calls
for a very special punishment, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask him why he's so angry.

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0003
rows.name:
You're a BLADE, yes? I work as a mechanic for your
organization. My name is Fozimure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0004
rows.name:
Work has been especially busy of late, you know?
So I asked my brother, Sostenasa, for help fixing a
pair of military vehicles, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0005
rows.name:
But I've been waiting for ages, and I've yet to receive
word of its completion. It's so, so vexing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0007
rows.name:
Sorry about all that. You have enough to worry about
fighting on the front lines, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0008
rows.name:
Thing is, I recently asked my brother Sostenasa for help
with my work, but...it isn't going well, you know?
The situation has me a little riled up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0009
rows.name:
My brother's heart isn't in his work lately, so I thought
I might go and...what is it you humans say? Light a 
fire under his britches, I think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0010
rows.name:
BLADEs are out there right now, putting themselves at
risk on our behalf, you know? So what is he thinking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ah, I see. You're the BLADE assisting Sostenasa,
are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0012
rows.name:
Allow me to thank you. You seem to be helping him
rediscover something I'd feared he lost sight of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025502_MSG0013
rows.name:
...Though I suppose it's best you heard about it from
him, isn't it? But I do hope your efforts help to rekindle
his passion for his work, okay?[ST:wait ]
